item.description:
May 4 - 11, 2013 explore with us the wonders of ancient Egypt on this exciting group adventure!

Once again, we'll be partnering with the Global Expeditions Club and joining their members from all over the US and Canada on a classic group expedition through Egypt!

Join the club on a group tour to Egypt May 4 - 11, 2013

On this exciting 8 day adventure, we will explore the highlights of Egypt in the comfort of 4 - 5 star hotels and a 1st class sleeper train. This tour is an excellent option for those who wish to see the best of Egypt in comfort and with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

GET THE SCOOP! Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $1,899, pp plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this awesome adventure:

* 8d/7n guided group adventure to Egypt
* 4 - 5 star hotels throughout
* 2 nights on a 1st class sleeper train
* Guided tours of the Pyramids of Giza, Luxor, Valley of the Kings, Karnak Temple, Aswan, Abu Simbel Temples and Cairo
* Expert English speaking Egyptologist Guide
* Global Expeditions Club Tour Leader
* Sailboat ride on the Nile on a traditional Felucca boat
* Breakfast daily
* Entrance fees to all sites as indicated in the itinerary
* All train station transfers
* All transfers and tours in modern air-conditioned vehicles

Click here for complete details.

Places Visited: Egypt Group Tour, Pyramids of Giza, Luxor, Valley of the Kings, Karnak Temple, Aswan, Abu Simbel Temples, Cairo

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 15,000+ members.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: Egypt: A Classic Group Expedition - 8 Days
